metadataAttributes.Title: Information Technology (IT) and Cloud Fundamentals Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Kickstart a new IT and Cloud Career . Master hardware, operating systems, programming, database, networking, storage, cybersecurity, and Cloud computing essentials.
metadataAttributes.Skills: IT Fundamentals, Cybersecurity, Cloud, Networking, hardware, Technical Support, IT Service Management (ITSM), Troubleshooting, IT Career, Software Development Process, database management, Software Application Development,
